solution_line_template: In three months, Karen would make a total of ${karen_salary_per_month} * {karen_months_to_calculate} = $<<{karen_salary_per_month}*{karen_months_to_calculate}={karen_total_salary_in_three_months}>>{karen_total_salary_in_three_months}.

To make the same amount of money John would need to work ${karen_total_salary_in_three_months} / ${john_salary_per_month} = <<{karen_total_salary_in_three_months}/{john_salary_per_month}={john_months_to_match_karen}>>{john_months_to_match_karen} months.
